clinical_study.brief_title: Evaluation of Covid 19 Knowledge Anxiety and Expectation Levels of Turkish Physicians, Survey Study
clinical_study.official_title: Evaluation of Covid 19 Knowledge Anxiety and Expectation Levels of Turkish Physicians, Survey Study

lead_sponsor.agency: Kanuni Sultan Suleyman Training and Research Hospital

clinical_study.source: Kanuni Sultan Suleyman Training and Research Hospital

brief_summary.textblock: It is aimed to measure the general health information of Turkish physicians about covid 19 pandemic, to evaluate anxiety levels and to evaluate future expectations in this period.

primary_outcome.measure: Evaluation of covid-19 knowledge level of turkish physicians
primary_outcome.description: beck depression scale The BDI inventory has maximum of 63 and minimum of 0 scores: (0-10): Are considered normal ups and downs (11-16): Mild mood disturbance (17-20): Borderline clinical depression (21-30): Moderate depression, (31-40): Severe depression, Over 40: Extreme depression. A persistent score of !17, requires psychiatric treatment

secondary_outcome.measure: what they think about the future
secondary_outcome.description: Turkish physicians write their thoughts about the health system after covid 19 with their own sentences

intervention.description: turkish physicians, who work active in pandemic hospital.

study_pop.textblock: turkish physicians, who work active in pandemic hospital

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- turkish physicians
- work active in pandemic hospital
Exclusion Criteria:
- work in another country
- retired physicians

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: Kanuni Sultan Suleyman Training and Research Hospital
